name: Opus Ludum
description:
Opus Ludum is a game of wit and skill, where you will have to overcome various challenges that will test your razor-sharp intellect at every step. Opus Ludum will give you a break from daily stress, although it might just break your head.

Opus Ludum is a compendium of various types of classic and new wit challenges, that will transport you away from worldly problems and plunge you into entertaining wits, should you take on the adventure, it will exercise your intellect incrementally. Whether you outsmart the challenges quickly, or go through extended brain storming hours, you will surely have a blast!

Features

- Think out of the box



- Overcome math problems



- Overcome Physical problems



- Break your head and put the pieces together



- Remember



- Drive at full speed



- Escape mazes
